biography.text: Web application developer, with full-stack experience, strong organizational skills and extensive project management and leadership experience. Creative and motivated analytical thinker, able to propose practical solutions to abstract problem sets. Extensive Information Technology knowledge and experience.
biography.headline: About Me

items.name: Russian
items.description: Visited in high school; lived for a semester abroad. University education & self-taught beyond.

items.name: Vuesume
items.tagline: Forked vuesme github project to practice working with Vue.js
items.description: The current page utilizes Vuesume. Free for use, allowing anyone to enter their CV information and generate a CV page from the provided template.

activity.description: Utilize MVC in .NET, working with UI team on contracts between View and Model.
Architected a custom build and deployment orchestration system combining over 200 projects into over 100 deployable artifacts.
Lead cross-department initiatives to automate code deployment increasing accuracy & reducing WIP.
Drive governance initiatives across technology and business pipelines through consensus building.
Organize and direct teams to ensure the efficient completion of large, difficult projects.
Troubleshoot system anomalies for performance degradation and inconsistencies.
Consistently build and deploy custom CMS platform.
Instituted best practices for SDLC including DSC (Git), Unit Testing and Naming Conventions.
Designed and deployed custom full stack, n-tiered .NET application with HTML/XML front-end, MSSQL backend for BI analysis of department head scheduling.
Coordinated different Information technology groups within the department to complete vendor and departmental requests.
Delivered customized SQL reports to business stake holders and project members.

items.name: Reinsurance Group of America
items.position: IT Consultant, Better Business Methods, LLC

activity.description: Produced a flexible, dynamic web part for presenting Oracle db query results in SharePoint 2007.
Designed SQL queries to retrieve data through SharePoint 2007's Report Builder web-parts.
Troubleshooting of technology problems on delivered equipment.
Worked on dispatched calls from Help Desk to fix customer technology problems.
Spearheaded project to migrate medical record SuperBase to SaaS web app using ASP.NET in C#.
Directed multiple large-scale reengineering initiatives simultaneously for EMR.
Constructed digital models based on physician guided requirements in custom BI environment.
